item.title: Showing off different properties of a dataset with python
item.description: In this post, I'll use python to show off different properties of a dataset. quakes <- quakes We can use python to find the mean of the numeric values in quakes import numpy as np #The mean of the latitudes is r.quakes.lat.mean() #The mean of the longitudes is ## -20.642749999999999 r.quakes.long.mean() #The mean of the depths is ## 179.46202 r.quakes.depth.mean() #The mean of the magnitudes is ## 311.37099999999998 r.quakes.mag.mean() ## 4.
